text:
February 14, 1961
Dr. Harry J. Skornia
School of Journalism and Communications
University of Illinois
Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Harry:
We are pleased to know of your invitation to
speak at the 16th Conference on Higher Education
in Chicago March 6 and are delighted that you
can accept*
Because we feel that it is important that the
overall role of higher education in television
be expertly articulated at such a gathering,
we are happy to underwrite your travel expenses
so that you can represent us on this occasion.
Cordially,
William G. Harley
